title: Wealthy Investors Pile Into Private Equity to Escape Stock Volatility
sub_head: Individual investors are pushing cash into private markets as public markets tumble, fund managers say
body:
Individual investors are increasing their bets on private-equity vehicles, hoping that these fundsâ€™ long-term horizon will offer a refuge from volatile public stock and fixed-income markets.
Private-fund managers say inflows of money from wealthy individual investors have increased this year, and asset managers expect the trend to continue as higher interest rates and inflation weigh on publicly traded assets.
